dc.title: Conclusions for 3 Years of Study on the Effect of Drought Stress and Available Nitrogen on Formation of Atypical Aging Flavor Defect in Wine
dc.creator: Cheng, Lailiang
Lakso, Alan
Henick-Kling, Thomas
Martinson, Tim
Acree, Terry
dc.description: Describes a three year vineyard study that used irrigation and supplemental nitrogen to reduce or delay appearance of Atypical Aging (ATA) wine flavor defect.
dc.subject: Wine and wine making
Drought
Flavor
Irrigation
Nitrogen
